record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2363
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2363 -- (Senate - November 15, 2007)

[Page: S14573]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there is a bill at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the first time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2363) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading, and in order to place the bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, for S. 2363, the report accompanying this bill is the Statement of Managers as printed in the conference report to accompany H.R. 3043 as Division B, Military Construction and Veterans Affairs and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008.
